replies.body: Eventually we will run out of these, and it will be a dark day indeed. We need to start making memes out of the current League games today! There are plenty of funny salty things said to people on League every day and we're just letting it rot.
Yeah we should try to make a forum where we can post these. Will look into it :D(maybe create a reddit)

I searched these up... 5 days ago...
My fav
http://imgur.com/a/4OFZE
OMG my fav Zilean skin still.

"Should I keep posting these?"

Is that a rhetorical question?
We could probably have a funniest playthrough contest and submit the best lines we find. We don't have a tribunal, but that doesn't mean we can't make fun of ourselves.
[This](http://imgur.com/a/KJVkD) is not any joke or thing but imo it's kinda funny seeing flamers go like this. Especially the last line :D
37 to 0 votes, you have no choice now
miss the tribunal tbh laughed so hard,
